page.title: 12SHEFFORD FIRE STATION
page.content: {Shefford Fire Station}consists of one fire engine, a fire tender and fifteen men.There is only one full-time fireman the remainder being part-time.The part-tme firemen are engineers,carpenters,lorry drivers, or electricians.Two of them are full-time firemen elsewhere. All the firemen attend the fire station on Tuesday evenings from 7 p.m. until 9 p.m. for drills.Five firemen are on call 24 hours a day.They are called out ,on average, six times a week. One of the part-time firemen is a woman.Mrs Julie Thatcher qualified in 1980 and has remained with the station eversince.
